name: Fantom Token from Ethereum
description: Forked from Ethereum with Pulsechain. Bridged from Ethereum via https://bridge.pulsechain.com. Original Address - 0x4E15361FD6b4BB609Fa63C81A2be19d873717870. Fantom is a high-performance, scalable, customizable, and secure smart-contract platform. It is designed to overcome the limitations of previous generation blockchain platforms. Fantom is permissionless, decentralized, and open-source.
